column5: Well here is a picture of my new niece. Her name is Deanna. My brother-in-law just started his 2 week leave from Afganhistan and he got home just in time to be there for the birth of his first child. She weighed in at 5 lbs 11 oz. I could have not asked for a better christmas gift and this is going to be a christmas two remember. At least the daddy can spend his 2 weeks with his daughter before he goes back on his tour.
Well it can't get any better then that!  MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!!
awesome Merry Christmas!
Great looking family. I hope your brother in-law enjoys his time with the family and let him know were all proud of him and the other troops doing what there doing.
Enjoy those precious moments they pass so quickly, Merry Christmas

Hi Smokey! Thank you  I told my mom last night to pass on all the support on here to him.When him and my sister went into her work the other day (a restarunt) everyone gave him a standing ovation when they walked in.  The troops really appreicate all the support they get from home.
That is awesome FG. Congrats to the family and thanks to the soldier  / father that puts himself in's harms way. Merry Christmas.
Thanks proboat, Merry Christmas to you too!  Thank you very much Squid! Merry Christmas to you too!
Congrats again, she's a cutie. Mom looks tired.  Mike
Thanks Mike! Yeah we all look like that after having a baby.LOL Sometimes worse.
wow, it's like a flashback to 6 weeks ago! hehe Congrats! baby's rock!  Happy Holidays!  UF
Thanks Urban Fisherman! My favorite stage is from newborn to a year. Newborns smell sooooo good and they are so innocent!
Sounds like you'll have a great Christmas! Congrats!
Awww...very cute...and great looking and happy family!!!! Congrats again!!
She is beautiful fishergirl.
The Santa stork came early, congrats !!

Thank you very much mistyriver1, steve paul, ccmt and pigeontroller! I talked to my sister today and both mom and baby are now at home well and happy!   I want to thank everyone for the kind words and support to our troops!
Good looking kids! a nice present this time of year!
Thank you very much Ohio Fisherman
Congrats to a healthy new baby.I nice way to bring in Christmas what wonderful timing for Dad.  Mike
